data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Kashima at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 1, Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Tosu's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Tosu Kashima's Ryohei Shirasaki is caught offside.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Kashima.
Kento Misao of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Tosu a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kashima throw-in in Tosu's half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 8, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Tosu.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Ryohei Shirasaki.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick Tosu.
Tosu push upfield but Koichiro Fukushima quickly pulls them for offside.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Kashima's Everaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, Everaldo of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
In the minute 29, Koichiro Fukushima blows against Tosu's Takeshi Kanamori for offside.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 31, Tosu are coming forward and Fuchi Honda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Kashima a goal kick.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 33, Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashima are pushing forward but Ryuji Izumi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 36, Tosu have a goal kick.
Tiago Alves for Tosu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Kashima at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Tosu in the half of Kashima.
Tosu's Daiki Matsuoka is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, Ryohei Shirasaki (Kashima) has received a yellow card from Koichiro Fukushima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 43, Kashima's Everaldo gets in a shot on goal at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Koki Machida's header is off-target for Kashima.
Tosu have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Tosu drives forward and Riki Harakawa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Tosu.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Yuta Higuchi is replacing Kaisei Ishii for the home team.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kashima throw-in in Tosu's half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Tosu.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 51, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
In the minute 55, Tosu's Yuto Uchida breaks free at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Throw-in Tosu.
In the minute 57, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Kashima's Everaldo fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu push forward at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium and Fuchi Honda gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kashima defence.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Daiki Matsuoka for Tosu has been booked by Koichiro Fukushima and receives a first yellow card.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Tosu a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Tosu make their third substitution with Tomoya Koyamatsu replacing Fuchi Honda.
Shoma Doi is replacing Ryuji Izumi for Kashima at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
The home team replace Takeshi Kanamori with Daichi Hayashi.
In the minute 63, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Kashima's Everaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Free kick Tosu.
In Tosu Tosu attack through Riki Harakawa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 68, Kashima have a goal kick.
Can Tosu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
Tosu pushes forward through Tiago Alves, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Tosu in the half of Kashima.
Leo Silva is on a sub for Ryohei Shirasaki for Kashima.
The away team have replaced Everaldo with Ayase Ueda. This is the third substitution made today by Zago.
In the minute 75, The away team replace Ryotaro Araki with Yuta Matsumura.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 79, Ayase Ueda (Kashima) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
Tosu make their fifth substitution with Renzo Lopez replacing Tiago Alves.
Ayumu Ohata is on a sub for Yuto Uchida for Tosu.
In the minute 80, Koichiro Fukushima awards Kashima a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tosu close to the penalty box.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
In the minute 85, Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Goal! Tomoya Inukai extends Kashima's lead to 0-2 in Tosu with a header.
In the minute 86, That's a fine assist from Yuta Matsumura.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 89, Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Tosu.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Tosu's Daichi Hayashi is on target but unsuccessful.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
In Tosu, Daichi Hayashi (Tosu) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
That's full-time at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. The final score is 0-2.
